title: Feature Table
description: A set of semantics containing per-tile and per-feature values defining the position and appearance properties for features in a tile.

binaryBodyReference.title: BinaryBodyReference
binaryBodyReference.description: An object defining the reference to a section of the binary body of the features table where the property values are stored if not defined directly in the JSON.

byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer in bytes.

componentType.description: The datatype of components in the property. This is defined only if the semantic allows for overriding the implicit component type. These cases are specified in each tile format.

property.title: Property
property.description: A user-defined property which specifies per-feature application-specific metadata in a tile. Values either can be defined directly in the JSON as an array, or can refer to sections in the binary body with a `BinaryBodyReference` object.

globalPropertyBoolean.title: GlobalPropertyBoolean
globalPropertyBoolean.description: An object defining a global boolean property value for all features.

globalPropertyScalar.title: GlobalPropertyScalar
globalPropertyScalar.description: An object defining a global numeric property value for all features.

byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer in bytes.

globalPropertyCartesian3.title: GlobalPropertyCartesian3
globalPropertyCartesian3.description: An object defining a global 3-component numeric property values for all features.

byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer in bytes.

globalPropertyCartesian4.title: GlobalPropertyCartesian4
globalPropertyCartesian4.description: An object defining a global 4-component numeric property values for all features.

byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer in bytes.
